description: Construction of a part-two and part-three-storey building with green roof to convert existing studio to 1 x 1-bedroom flat and provide an additional 1 x 2-bedroom flat, private amenity at ground floor and roof terrace on second floor with privacy screens, all together with the provision of cycle store and refuse store for new and existing flats; following demolition of single-storey rear extension, site clearance and associated alterations to No. 289 Higham Hill Road including installation of 1no. new window to second floor side elevation and 1 no. roof light to rear roof slope. (Amended description and amended plans with minor alterations to fenestrations)
site_name: 289 Higham Hill Road, Walthamstow, London, E17 5RQ
